java.lang.Object
main.labyrinth.models.game.Card
public class Card extends Object

  • Constructor Details

    • Card

      public Card(Integer treasure)
      Constructs a new Card with a specified treasure value.
      Parameters:
      treasure - : integer value representing the treasure associated with this card. It uniquely identifies the treasure, or indicates a special card state.

  • Method Details

    • getTreasure

      public Integer getTreasure()
      Retrieves the treasure associated with this card.
      Returns:
      an Integer representing the treasure, or null if the card is a "back" card

    • isFound

      public boolean isFound()
      Checks if the treasure associated with this card has been found.
      Returns:
      true if the treasure has been found, false otherwise

    • setFound

      public void setFound(boolean found)
      Sets the found status of the card's treasure. This status indicates whether the treasure associated with this card has been located.
      Parameters:
      found - a boolean value representing the found status of the card's treasure. If true, the treasure is marked as found; if false, it is marked as not found

    • isBackCard

      public boolean isBackCard()
      Determines whether the card is a "back" card.
      Returns:
      true if the card's treasure value is 24, indicating it is a "back" card; false otherwise

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Retrieves the "name", or status of the card, indicating whether it is a "back" card or a specific treasure card. If the card is a "back" card, it returns "Back"; otherwise, it returns "Treasure" followed by the treasure value.
      Returns:
      status of the card as a String, either "Back" or "Treasure" followed by the treasure value

    • createDeck

      public static List<Card> createDeck()
      Creates a new deck of cards for the game, consisting of 24 numbered treasure cards and a special "back" card with the number 24.
      Returns:
      a list of Card objects representing the complete deck for the game, including numbered treasure cards and one "back" card
